law.catch_line: Authority to adopt rules and regulations.
law.text: The State Department of Education is hereby authorized to adopt and promulgate such rules and regulations as it deems necessary and proper for carrying out the purposes of KRS 167.210 to 167.240.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 602, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 4.
